core.home.desc1: This is the site where you are the creator, the writer, the reviewer, the reader, the producer... and most important of all - the Lego fan!
core.home.desc2: Here you can take a step back, relax and enjoy sharing your love for Lego with others.
core.home.desc3: Enjoy the reviews of fans or share your own unabridged thoughts for others to read.
core.home.desc4: Find all the wonders that Lego bricks can create. And don't forget to share with friends! We, the team behind BrickView, would love to meet you!
